name: Holy plague
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 46.

  • Coding, writing, music: Adrien Dittrick
  • Artwork: Shinlalala

A small world has been created. However, it is being infested by a virulent plague which risks destroying everything. Use your ethereal powers to remove the cursed plague. Every day, you will have a choice to make. Your choices will have consequences later down the line.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys: move
  • Hold down the jump button while in mid-air to use your holy light
  • F4: fullscreen (windows only)

Features:

  • 6 days of gameplay
  • 12 choices
  • 2 endings
  • Natural disasters
  • Artificial disasters

Game Maker Studio 2 source is available to download!
